column1: *Suggested format for parameter column headers is in Recommended Vocabulary File. User can decide to use other column headers. All column headers must be defined in Terminology File.*
Delete column A and rows 1-4 and 6-11 prior to template use.

column2: Date and time of measurement (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss) (recommended in UTC)
column3: Local date and time of measurement (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss). Populate bracket with time zone acronym (e.g., PST) or UTC offset (e.g., UTCminus2)
column4: Example parameter. User should only include paramaters for their dataset. See Recommended Vocabulary file.
column5: Example parameter. User should only include paramaters for their dataset. See Recommended Vocabulary file.
column6: Example parameter. User should only include paramaters for their dataset. See Recommended Vocabulary file.
column7: User-determined ID for the sensor or multi-parameter sonde. Include if one data column contains data from multiple sensors.
column8: Alphanumeric code (defined by user in terminology file) to indicate information about measurement

column9: Removed sonde and replaced with new sensor. No DO.
